pullRequest.title: Merge master to offline feature branch

commit.message: fix: don't reuse endpoint nullable checker state (#9019)

Send clear event if no other changes done on attach (#9017)

Send clear event if no other changes done on attach

Fixes #9015

Read text for template element (#9008)

* Read text content as an attribute data

* Add unit tests for template element set text

* Add IT for template element set text

* Update IT after change for reading text

* Improve code a bit based on review

* Add missed tag for the component

* Remove extra symbol

* Add lost lines after merge

Deprecate UI.getRouter() and use it only as internal (#9020)

Fixes #8989
refactor: move methods from endpoint nullable checker to a helper (#9022)
Keep ui reference to avoid its GC during test (#9021)
chore: fix typo (#9032)

Deprecate Polymer Template related classes (#9025)

* Extract common template classes and deprecate polymer support
* Deprecate and extract common functionality from polymertemplate package
* Deprecate polymer tempate Id annotation
* Deprecate Polymer template related classes
* Deprecate impl classes
* Correct javadocs
* Exclude classes from serializable test

Add test for forwardTo from setParameter without BeforeEnterObserver. (#9030)

Add test for forwardTo from setParameter without BeforeEnterObserver.

Be aware of property value in the Element (#9031)

Part of #9012

fix a flaky test in VaadinConnectControllerTest (#9041)

The test `VaadinConnectControllerTest.should_bePossibeToGetPrincipalInEndpoint` fails randomly in CI, the reason seems to be that the `MockVaadinServletService service` is garbage collected before the endpoint invocation. 
Change `MockVaadinServletService service` to be a field instance to prevent the garbage collection from happening.

JavaScriptBootstrapHandler: Do not compute push url from service and request url on the server side (#9040)

Fixes a regression where the relative path calculation went wrong if the parameter contains a slash.

Set `display:none` in addition to `hidden` attribute when hiding elements inside a shadow root (#9026)

Set `display:none` in addition to `hidden` attribute when hiding elements inside a shadow root

Fixes #8256

Remove faux Serializable from AppShellSettings (#9048)

Fixes #9047

Clear all routes references in ConfigureRoutes. (#9050)

Clear all routes references in ConfigureRoutes including the RouteModel.
Force size re-estimate when requested range end equals assumed size (#9033)
Fix JavaDoc typos (#9055)

Restructure dev mode handler logic to avoid starting webpack twice (#9061)

Restructure dev mode handler logic to avoid starting webpack twice

Fixes #8981

Skip data provider verification in AbstractDataView if default one is used (#9052)

* Skip data provider verification in AbstractDataView if default one is used in data communicator

* Improve explanatory comments

* Make empty data provider public for being used in components
Use regular stream instead rather than parallel (#9074)
fix: each UI should have its own CSRF token (#9071)

Update javadoc of rerouteTo()/forwardTo() (#9060)

Update javadoc of rerouteTo()/forwardTo() to clear out the difference between the two

feat: add API for disabling data fetching to DC (#9070)

Part of vaadin/vaadin-combo-box-flow#355

Extract polymer templates into separate module (#9067)

Extract polymer templates into separate module

Fixes #9067

Extract lit template support to a separate module (#9073)

Extract Lit templates support to a separate module

Fixes #9038

fix: fail access check when no csrf token in session (#9072)

* fix: fail access check when no csrf token in session

* apply code review suggestion
Merge branch 'master' into haijian/merge-master
